cards 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

ARD as JSON

Source: R/json.R
json.Rd

Convert ARDs to JSON or write to disk as JSON

Usage

ard_as_json(x, ...)

write_ard_as_json(x, path, ...)

as_nested_list(x)

Arguments

x

an ARD

...

additional conversion arguments, see also jsonlite::toJSON()

path

file on disk

Value

a JSON object

Examples

ard <-
  dplyr::bind_rows(
    ard_continuous(mtcars, by = cyl, variables = c("mpg", "hp")),
    ard_continuous(mtcars, by = c(cyl, gear), variables = c("mpg", "hp"))
  )

ard_as_json(ard)
